div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Dec. 12, 1900. THE NORWEGIAN SOCIETY FOR THE HOME FOR THE AGEDBethlehem Branch Holds Annual Meeting

body.p: The Bethlehem Branch of the Norwegian Society for the Home for the Aged held its annual meeting Monday December 10, at Bethlehem Church.
The meeting was opened with a prayer by K. P. Kristensen. The secretary's report on the previous meeting was read and accepted. Mr. W. F. Christiansen reported that everything is well at the Home.
Nominations were made for members of the board of directors, members of the ladies aid board, members of the board of directors of the Branch, and members of the Branch committees.
The monthly fees were paid. The next meeting is to be held on January 14, 1901, at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Amundsen, 195 West Erie Street.
